main_definition: Specifications refer to detailed descriptions or requirements that outline the features, functions, or characteristics of something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Technical standards or criteria for a product's design and performance
meanings_and_examples.example: The specifications for this new smartphone include a high-resolution display and an extended battery life.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Detailed instructions on how to build something or carry out a task
meanings_and_examples.example: The construction specifications provided by the architect included precise measurements and materials needed for each component of the building.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A document that lists all the requirements, features, and constraints related to a particular project or product
meanings_and_examples.example: Before manufacturing the car model, engineers reviewed the specifications to ensure it met safety standards and performance criteria.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The precise measurements or technical details of something
meanings_and_examples.example: The specifications for this piece of machinery include a maximum operating temperature of 150 degrees Celsius and a power output of 2 kilowatts.
